sense.def: Alternative Writing 癆瘵 ; Abbreviated Designation 瘵 , Alternative Names zhai ji 瘵疾 , consumption ailment; xu zhai 虛瘵 , depletion consumption; lei zhai 羸瘵 , emaciation consumption; pi zhai 疲瘵 , weariness consumption; zhai zhu 瘵疰 , consumption attachment-illness; chuan shi 傳屍 , corpse [evil] transmission. Pathological Condition of infectious xu lao 虛勞 , depletion exhaustion. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 93: 凡欲取下勞 瘵藥，先服温中平補五臟四神湯， “Whenever one intends to use drugs to end exhaustion consumption one should first ingest the ‘decoction with the four wondrous ingredients’ that warms the center, and levels and supplements the five depots”.
